callback_with_context.context_function_id: slot = StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignBuildingSlot") | slot.IsBuildingNew || slot.IsUpgrading || slot.IsRepairing => "UI_CAM_HUD_Construction_Cancel" | slot.IsDismantling => "UI_CLICK_Cancel_Decline" | slot.CanUpgrade && self.ParentContext.Id != "slot_entry" && !slot.IsEmpty && self.CurrentState == "hover" => "UI_CLICK_Building_Upgrade" | slot.IsEmpty && self.CurrentState == "hover" => "UI_CLICK_Construction_Start"

empty_slot.comment: The value 106 is the sum of the height of a tree slot (74), plus the height of an arrow(32, also defined as the TreeCallback padding)

tier_frame.comment: The value 106 is the sum of the height of a tree slot (74), plus the height of an arrow(32, also defined as the TreeCallback padding). The values 8 and 4 are just some padding to make it look correct

callback_with_context.context_function_id: self.Resize( (BuildingSetContext.MaximumChainBuildings(GetIfElse(IsContextValid( StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement")), StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement"), StoredContext("CcoCampaignCharacter") )) / 2) * 100 + ToNumber( self.GetProperty("extra_padding")), (BuildingSetContext.MaximumChainBuildings(GetIfElse(IsContextValid( StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement")), StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement"), StoredContext("CcoCampaignCharacter") )) / 2) * 100 + ToNumber(self.GetProperty("extra_padding")), true)
